dcterms:creator: M. Grammatopoulou
A. Kanellopoulos
K. G. Vamvoudakis
dcterms:description: An anonymized dataset containing 1816 instances of leaks in the water network of Arlington County, Virginia, over the last five years, including information about the location of the leak, the time period between the identification of the leak and its repair, as well as the occurred cost.
dcterms:title: Arlington County Water Leak Dataset

dcterms:creator: R. M. Clark
S. Hakim
dcterms:description: Historical data of leaks in Arlington County, providing insights into the security of water and wastewater systems.
dcterms:title: Historical Data of Leaks in Arlington County
